verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> man was <S%G2258><s%> sick, <S%G770><s%> named Lazarus, <S%G2976><s%> of <S%G575><s%> Bethany, <S%G963><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> town <S%G2968><s%> of Mary <S%G3137><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> sister <S%G79><s%> Martha. <S%G3136><s%>

(It <S%G1161><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> that Mary <S%G3137><s%> which anointed <S%G218><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> with ointment, <S%G3464><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wiped <S%G1591><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> with her <S%G848><s%> hair, <S%G2359><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> was sick.) <S%G770><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> his sisters <S%G79><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> behold, <S%G2396><s%> he whom <S%G3739><s%> thou lovest <S%G5368><s%> is sick. <S%G770><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that, he said, <S%G2036><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> sickness <S%G769><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> but <S%G235><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> might be glorified <S%G1392><s%> thereby. <S%G1223><s%> <S%G846><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> Martha, <S%G3136><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> sister, <S%G79><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Lazarus. <S%G2976><s%>

When <S%G5613><s%> he had heard <S%G191><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he was sick, <S%G770><s%> he abode <S%G3306><s%> <S%G3303><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> still <S%G5119><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the same <S%G3739><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> where he was. <S%G2258><s%>
Then <S%G1899><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that <S%G5124><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> he to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Let us go <S%G71><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> again. <S%G3825><s%>

His disciples <S%G3101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Master, <S%G4461><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> of late <S%G3568><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> to stone <S%G3034><s%> thee; <S%G4571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> goest <S%G5217><s%> thou thither <S%G1563><s%> again? <S%G3825><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> there not <S%G3780><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> hours <S%G5610><s%> in the <S%G3588><s%> day? <S%G2250><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> he stumbleth <S%G4350><s%> not, <S%G3756><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he seeth <S%G991><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world. <S%G2889><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> night, <S%G3571><s%> he stumbleth, <S%G4350><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

These things <S%G5023><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> he: and <S%G2532><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that <S%G5124><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> friend <S%G5384><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> sleepeth; <S%G2837><s%> but <S%G235><s%> I go, <S%G4198><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I may awake him out of sleep. <S%G1852><s%> <S%G846><s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> he sleep, <S%G2837><s%> he shall do well. <S%G4982><s%>

Howbeit <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> spake <S%G2046><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> death: <S%G2288><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G1565><s%> thought <S%G1380><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he had spoken <S%G3004><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> taking of rest <S%G2838><s%> in sleep. <S%G5258><s%>
Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> plainly, <S%G3954><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> is dead. <S%G599><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I am glad <S%G5463><s%> for your sakes <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5209><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I was <S%G2252><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> there, <S%G1563><s%> to the intent <S%G2443><s%> ye may believe; <S%G4100><s%> nevertheless <S%G235><s%> let us go <S%G71><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> which is called <S%G3004><s%> Didymus, <S%G1324><s%> unto his fellow disciples, <S%G4827><s%> Let us <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> go, <S%G71><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we may die <S%G599><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> he found <S%G2147><s%> that <S%G846><s%> he had <S%G2192><s%> lain in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> grave <S%G3419><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> already. <S%G2235><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> Bethany <S%G963><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> nigh unto <S%G1451><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> fifteen <S%G1178><s%> furlongs <S%G4712><s%> off: <S%G575><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Martha <S%G3136><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> comfort <S%G3888><s%> them <S%G846><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> their <S%G846><s%> brother. <S%G80><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> Martha, <S%G3136><s%> as soon as <S%G5613><s%> she heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was coming, <S%G2064><s%> went and met <S%G5221><s%> him: <S%G846><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> sat <S%G2516><s%> still in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house. <S%G3624><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Martha <S%G3136><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> thou hadst been <S%G2258><s%> here, <S%G5602><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> had not <S%G3756><s%> died. <S%G2348><s%> <S%G302><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> I know, <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> now, <S%G3568><s%> whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> thou wilt ask <S%G154><s%> <S%G302><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> will give <S%G1325><s%> it thee. <S%G4671><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto her, <S%G846><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> shall rise again. <S%G450><s%>

Martha <S%G3136><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he shall rise again <S%G450><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> resurrection <S%G386><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto her, <S%G846><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> resurrection, <S%G386><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> life: <S%G2222><s%> he that believeth <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> me, <S%G1691><s%> though <S%G2579><s%> he were dead, <S%G599><s%> yet shall he live: <S%G2198><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> whosoever <S%G3956><s%> liveth <S%G2198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> believeth <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> shall never <S%G3364><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> die. <S%G599><s%> Believest <S%G4100><s%> thou this? <S%G5124><s%>

She saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> Lord: <S%G2962><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which should come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world. <S%G2889><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when she had so <S%G5023><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> she went her way, <S%G565><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G5455><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> her <S%G848><s%> sister <S%G79><s%> secretly, <S%G2977><s%> saying, <S%G2036><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Master <S%G1320><s%> is come, <S%G3918><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> calleth <S%G5455><s%> for thee. <S%G4571><s%>
As soon as <S%G5613><s%> she <S%G1565><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that, she arose <S%G1453><s%> quickly, <S%G5035><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was not yet <S%G3768><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> town, <S%G2968><s%> but <S%G235><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> Martha <S%G3136><s%> met <S%G5221><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> which were <S%G5607><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> her <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house, <S%G3614><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> comforted <S%G3888><s%> her, <S%G846><s%> when they saw <S%G1492><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> she rose up <S%G450><s%> hastily <S%G5030><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> went out, <S%G1831><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> her, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> She goeth <S%G5217><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> grave <S%G3419><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> weep <S%G2799><s%> there. <S%G1563><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> was come <S%G2064><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was, <S%G2258><s%> and saw <S%G1492><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> she fell down <S%G4098><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet, <S%G4228><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> thou hadst been <S%G2258><s%> here, <S%G5602><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> had not <S%G3756><s%> died. <S%G599><s%> <S%G302><s%>

When <S%G5613><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> her <S%G846><s%> weeping, <S%G2799><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> also weeping <S%G2799><s%> which came with <S%G4905><s%> her, <S%G846><s%> he groaned <S%G1690><s%> in the <S%G3588><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> was troubled. <S%G5015><s%> <S%G1438><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> have ye laid <S%G5087><s%> him? They <S%G846><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> see. <S%G1492><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> wept. <S%G1145><s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Behold <S%G2396><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> he loved <S%G5368><s%> him! <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Could <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> this man, <S%G3778><s%> which opened <S%G455><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> blind, <S%G5185><s%> have caused <S%G4160><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> this man <S%G3778><s%> should not <S%G3361><s%> have died? <S%G599><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> groaning <S%G1690><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> grave. <S%G3419><s%> It <S%G1161><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> a cave, <S%G4693><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a stone <S%G3037><s%> lay <S%G1945><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> Take ye away <S%G142><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> stone. <S%G3037><s%> Martha, <S%G3136><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sister <S%G79><s%> of him that was dead, <S%G2348><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> by this time <S%G2235><s%> he stinketh: <S%G3605><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he hath been <S%G2076><s%> dead four days. <S%G5066><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto her, <S%G846><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> I not <S%G3756><s%> unto thee, <S%G4671><s%> that, <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> thou wouldest believe, <S%G4100><s%> thou shouldest see <S%G3700><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> they took away <S%G142><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> stone <S%G3037><s%> from the place where <S%G3757><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dead <S%G2348><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> laid. <S%G2749><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> lifted <S%G142><s%> up <S%G507><s%> his eyes, <S%G3788><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> I thank <S%G2168><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou hast heard <S%G191><s%> me. <S%G3450><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou hearest <S%G191><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> always: <S%G3842><s%> but <S%G235><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> which stand by <S%G4026><s%> I said <S%G2036><s%> it, that <S%G2443><s%> they may believe <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> hast sent <S%G649><s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he thus <S%G5023><s%> had spoken, <S%G2036><s%> he cried <S%G2905><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> Lazarus, <S%G2976><s%> come <S%G1204><s%> forth. <S%G1854><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he that was dead <S%G2348><s%> came forth, <S%G1831><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> foot <S%G4228><s%> with graveclothes: <S%G2750><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> face <S%G3799><s%> was bound about <S%G4019><s%> with a napkin. <S%G4676><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Loose <S%G3089><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G863><s%> him go. <S%G5217><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> which came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> had seen <S%G2300><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> did, <S%G4160><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
